defines.comment: The class of dereferenceable resources.
defines.label: Hydra Resource

defines.comment: The class of Hydra classes. Hydra classes and their instances are dereferenceable resources.
defines.label: Hydra Class

defines.comment: The class of properties representing links.
defines.label: Link

defines.comment: A link to the API documentation
defines.label: apiDocumentation

defines.comment: The Hydra API documentation class
defines.label: ApiDocumentation

defines.comment: A link to main entry point of the Web API
defines.label: entrypoint

defines.comment: A class known to be supported by the Web API
defines.label: supported classes

defines.comment: A status that might be returned by the Web API (other statuses should be expected and properly handled as well)
defines.label: possible status

defines.comment: The properties known to be supported by a Hydra class
defines.label: supported properties

defines.comment: A property known to be supported by a Hydra class.
defines.label: Supported Property

defines.comment: A property
defines.label: property

defines.comment: True if the property is required, false otherwise.
defines.label: required

defines.comment: True if the client can retrieve the property's value, false otherwise.
defines.label: readable

defines.comment: True if the client can change the property's value, false otherwise.
defines.label: writeable

defines.comment: An operation supported by instances of the specific Hydra class or the target of the Hydra link
defines.label: supported operation

defines.comment: An operation supported by the Hydra resource
defines.label: operation

defines.comment: An operation.
defines.label: Operation

defines.comment: The HTTP method.
defines.label: method

defines.comment: The information expected by the Web API.
defines.label: expects

defines.comment: The information returned by the Web API on success
defines.label: returns

defines.comment: Additional information about a status code that might be returned.
defines.label: Status code description

defines.comment: The HTTP status code
defines.label: status code

defines.comment: A title, often used along with a description.
defines.label: title

defines.comment: A description.
defines.label: description

defines.comment: A runtime error, used to report information beyond the returned status code.
defines.label: Error

defines.comment: A collection holding references to a number of related resources.
defines.label: Collection

defines.comment: Collections somehow related to this resource.
defines.label: collection

defines.comment: Semantics of each member provided by the collection.
defines.label: manages

defines.comment: The subject.
defines.label: subject

defines.comment: The object.
defines.label: object

defines.comment: A member of the collection
defines.label: member

defines.comment: A specific view of a resource.
defines.label: view

defines.comment: A PartialCollectionView describes a partial view of a Collection. Multiple PartialCollectionViews can be connected with the the next/previous properties to allow a client to retrieve all members of the collection.
defines.label: PartialCollectionView

defines.comment: The total number of items referenced by a collection.
defines.label: total items

defines.comment: The first resource of an interlinked set of resources.
defines.label: first

defines.comment: The last resource of an interlinked set of resources.
defines.label: last

defines.comment: The resource following the current instance in an interlinked set of resources.
defines.label: next

defines.comment: The resource preceding the current instance in an interlinked set of resources.
defines.label: previous

defines.comment: A IRI template that can be used to query a collection.
defines.label: search

defines.comment: A property representing a freetext query.
defines.label: freetext query

defines.comment: A templated link.
defines.label: Templated Link

defines.comment: The class of IRI templates.
defines.label: IRI Template

defines.comment: A templated string with placeholders. The literal's datatype indicates the template syntax; if not specified, hydra:Rfc6570Template is assumed.
defines.label: template

defines.comment: An IRI template as defined by RFC6570.
defines.label: RFC6570 IRI template

defines.comment: The representation format to use when expanding the IRI template.
defines.label: variable representation

defines.comment: A representation specifies how to serialize variable values into strings.
defines.label: VariableRepresentation

defines.comment: A representation that serializes just the lexical form of a variable value, but omits language and type information.
defines.label: BasicRepresentation

defines.comment: A representation that serializes a variable value including its language and type information and thus differentiating between IRIs and literals.
defines.label: ExplicitRepresentation

defines.comment: A variable-to-property mapping of the IRI template.
defines.label: mapping

defines.comment: A mapping from an IRI template variable to a property.
defines.label: IriTemplateMapping

defines.comment: An IRI template variable
defines.label: variable

defines.comment: Instructs to skip N elements of the set.
defines.label: skip

defines.comment: Instructs to limit set only to N elements.
defines.label: take

defines.comment: Instructs to provide a specific page of the collection at a given index.
defines.label: page index

defines.comment: Instructs to provide a specific page reference of the collection.
defines.label: page reference

defines.comment: Name of the header returned by the operation.
defines.label: returns header

defines.comment: Specification of the header expected by the operation.
defines.label: expects header

http://purl.org/dc/terms/description: The Hydra Core Vocabulary is a lightweight vocabulary to create hypermedia-driven Web APIs. By specifying a number of concepts commonly used in Web APIs it enables the creation of generic API clients.

comment: A lightweight vocabulary for hypermedia-driven Web APIs
label: The Hydra Core Vocabulary
